line.content: Network Mom is licensed for 30 days for free. We encourage you to try Network Mom Availability and make certain it meets your needs before spending any money. Network Mom LLC licenses Network Mom Availability through Apple's MacOS App Store. As of February 2019 Network Mom Availability is:
You can purchase a license in the
Network Mom Availability -> License Purchase or Status
. Emailed reports include a reminder of the license expiration date.

Network Mom LLC makes no guarantees that Network Mom Availability will run on future versions of MacOS. Purchasing a Network Mom Availability license will support us as we add features to this monitoring system.
Once the license expires, all monitors will turn gray. Reports will cease to carry useful data. Alerts will not function.

A purchased license is valid on all Macintoshes operating under a particular iCloud account. Network Mom LLC encourages our customers to run Network Mom Availability on two diverse monitoring stations to minimize the risk that an outage at one location will prevent alerts from getting to support personnel.

Make sure to review our “License information” page at https://networkmom.net/availability/license.html (or under “License Information” in this Help Book). There are dozens of reasons why Network Mom Availability (or any other monitoring system) may be unable to deliver alerts successfully in case of an outage. By using Network Mom Availability you agree not to hold us liable for that unfortunate reality.
